comments.html: I used to try to do that. Having SIMPLE question as described in the blog is key. When I was involved in interviewing (a while back!), it was usually medium to expert level people though. I tried running various recent things I'd encountered in the field by them. Mixed success ... it takes time to describe a complex scenario, and interviews can be scary enough to cause brain freeze in the candidates. I did end up with a small "fun" set of weirdly broken network situations eventually.
comments.name: Pete Welcher
